ygData.subject: Re: Wizards being resisted
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of steal killing in Oasis.  There was a wizard(I believe that was his class) on Povar by the name of Yabin who is notorious for stealing kills.
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of steal killing in Oasis. There was a wizard(I believe that was
his class) on Povar by the name of Yabin who is notorious for stealing
kills. Several people reported his activities by way of /petition and a GM
answered all the complaints in a matter of minutes. This wasn't one or two
kills but literally everything that moved that might give him experience.
He would cast twice at it and run off to find something else. Those two
spells did more than half damage to the creature so eventually when it was
killed he got the experience.

If someone is ruining your play experience like that person you can at least
help the GMs be aware of the problem by /petition ing and making a
complaint.

Shawn

-----Original Message-----
From: Magis [mailto:Magis@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 17, 1999 11:43 AM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Wizards being resisted


From: Magis <Magis@...>

VorteksJRC@... wrote:

> From: VorteksJRC@...
>
> Enchanters aren't supposed to be good at DD. Enchanters are for INDIRECT
> damage. You shouldn't expect to see incredible powers. As for necros being
> stronger...that may be true. But remember, they pay there price for it.

I'd say an Enchanter( level 20) Stole a LJ kill from my group ( all level
16-20's) in oasis last night .. You figure it out .. (Btw it was 3 tanks 1
mage 1 necro)


--

Jamie Macdonald

A.K.A
Magis DarkStone
Mercenary Mage
Erollisi Marr
